transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji Vishnu ji, Ashima Desai.
Customer: Ji ji, mam ji aapne bataya whatsapp par wo sab byleads wagera a rahi hai na whatsapp par a rahi hai mam app me dikha raha hai.
Executive: Sir maine wahi aapko bola tha dekho sir maine tab bhi aapko yahi bola tha main aaj bhi aapko yahi bolungi sir maine aapse teen mahine ka time manga tha agree main ye recording me isliye baat kar rahi hu.
Customer: 100% byleads bhi to consume karni hai jisse aapne likh ke diya business milega.
Executive: Sir I agree suniye sir please bilkul sir main wahi baat kar rahi hu pehle meri baat suniye maine aapse kaha tha ki main teen mahine ke andar aapko business la ke dungi pehli cheez right lekin uske liye aapko 100% account use karna padega teesri cheez maine aapko ye bhi kaha tha ki sir main pura enrichment website aapka karwa rahi hu right sir to maine wahi cheez kari sir abhi hamari cheez changes hui hai thoda keyword adding hui hai purane meta tag hate hai to isme thoda sa time lagta hai sir aisa nahi hai ki main aapko daily lead share karke daily lead bheju jo aap bol rahe the na Himani ne mujhe aake bataya maine usko bhi bola us time pe ki sir ko ye feedback do ki sir sirf ko hamare humne ye nahi kaha hum kaam nahi karenge humme pata hai hamari commitment kya hai humne kya bola hai kyuki humne sab kuch likh ke diya hai aur jo hum karte hai hum wahi likh ke de rahe hai sir to thoda sa aur 100% byleads consume karne jisse to aapne likh ke diya na mam mere ko.
Executive: Sir I know maine consume karne ke liye bola hai lekin consume to aap tab karoge na jab organic dikhega waha pe kuch.
Customer: Ha to aapne kaha tha ki hum denge aapko same cheez.
Executive: Sir maine bola dene ke liye main mana kaha kar rahi hu par aap mujhe thoda time to doge sir aap me se abhi aapne aap khud batao sir aapne 18 tarikh ko payment kiya hai ek hafte ki meri chutti thi 25 tarikh ke baad maine profile pe kaam shuru karaya hai sir hardly paanch din bhi nahi hue sir how can I say that ki theek hai sir main aapko business taratar leads dene start kar du sir aap thoda mujhe time to doge na sir is cheez ke liye ye to aap bhi manoge na is cheez ke liye main aise kaise commit kar du sir main main kaise commit koi aapko delivery kar du maine aapko bola sir agar main kar paungi cheeze teen mahine me to theek hai otherwise to aapke pass hai na floor main aapko refund karne ke liye mana thodi na karungi sir kisi cheez ke liye aapka paisa hai sir aapka paisa sahi jagah laga hai aap ye mat sochna Vishnu ji aapka paisa kharab jagah ki refund nahi ho sakti cheeze.
Customer: Nahi wo to pata hai mam mere ko IndiaMART ka pata hai mere ko wo to maine IndiaMART ko bheji diya tha aapko nahi bheja ye to IndiaMART ke pass bilkul to aap mere upar bhi thoda trust rakho aapne jo plan kiya usme mere ko business chahiye mam main keh raha tha mere ko time chahiye aapne kaha ki bilkul milega sir main thoda sa time main wahi bol rahi hu sir thoda sa aap mujhe time do maine bhi aapko.
Executive: aapko plan lene se pehle kaha tha ki time do mere ko aapne main bar bar phone aa raha hai mere ko maine kaha time.
Customer: Sir diya na maine bhi time aapne mujhe bola main 18 tarikh ko payment karunga batao kitne call aaye mere sir.
Executive: Wo to aapne final aapne payment karwa aapne bola na sir aap hi ne bola sir kaisi baatein kar rahe hai aap hi ne to bola tha sir ki main 18 tarikh ko payment karunga aap kuch bhi kar lo usse pehle main nahi karunga bola tha na sir to payment bhi aapne 18 tarikh ko hi kari apne according sir mere according aapne 17 ko 16 ko 14 ko 12 ko to nahi ki sir to maine bhi aapko ye nahi kaha ki sir main aapko business nahi de rahi sir main.
Customer: Ji bataye sir. ye cheeze main 18 tarikh ko mujhe email mila tha IndiaMART ka hi ki agar aaj aap payment karte ho to aapko 70000 plus GST me payment karna hai aapne to 75000 karwaya tha mere se.
Executive: Sorry maine email sham ko dekha tha din me dekha nahi tha wo.
Customer: Ha bolo sir. 18 tarikh ko subah 7 baje mere ko email aaya tha IndiaMART ki taraf se.
Executive: Ha ha. aaj aap payment karte ho to aapko 18000 70000 plus GST pay karna hai 70000 plus GST.
Customer: Theek hai sir. to aapne 75 plus GST pay karwaya mere se.
Executive: Sir jo factual hai wahi to hai na mere pass maine extra kya le liya aapse sir jo offer price tha jo cheez thi maine wo share kari hai aapke sath sir maine koi galat cheez nahi share kari aapke sath proper performer invoice gaya hai sir.
Customer: Achcha. price to price hota hai ab agle mahine aapko main ek cheez batau matlab offer tha aapko bhi pata hoga ye to offer chal raha tha abhi.
Executive: Sir main ek baat batau main kuch bhi apne account me to nahi le rahi na sir aap jo company mujhe de rahi hai maine wahi aapko bataya par main business ke liye try kar rahi hu sir maine ye nahi kaha ki main aapko nahi de rahi hu main khud aapke business me read out karne ki koshish kar rahi hu ki main isme aapko samne se sir ek baat batao agar main sir isme nahi kaam karti to main ye to nahi kehti ki sir ye naye keywords add kar du maine filterize karke lekar aayi thi na nikal ke aapne to mujhe nahi bataya tha sir maine hi check kiya tha na ki sir isko main kis tarike se resolve kar sakti hu isme aur kis tarike se listing aa sakti hai sir.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Aapne to mujhe sirf kaha tha ki ek product hai ki mera ispe kaam kara lo lekin maine aapse pucha na sir isko is tarike se hum kar sakte hai to sir aisa nahi hai Vishnu sir kaam chal kis tarike se bata rahe ho kis tarike se kaha tha.
Customer: Hanji. nahi kar na ji us tarike se change kiya kya change kiya ye puch raha hu.
Executive: Main bata deti hu sir ek minute ha. Aapse maine pucha tha ki sir aapka ye jo bottle king pins hai aapka jo exhausted wala hai ye hai welded king pin hai aapke ye dono add kar du aapne kaha tha na main deal karta hu kar do iske andar.
Customer: Ha. Aapne to mujhe nahi kaha tha Ashima ki iske king pin ke abhi jagah bolted king pin add karo related hai wahi to main bol rahi hu sir aap mujhe aur keyword bataoge to aur zyada achcha hoga kyuki is business ko aap mujhse zyada jante ho mujhe to isme study karna pad raha hai deep ja ke ki isko kis aur cheezo se check kar sakte hai lekin aapka ye business hai aap mujhe zyada achcha bata paoge.
Customer: main ye cheez janna chahta hu jaise abhi to aapke pass organic bylets hai nahi to aage ke agar consumer raha nahi to phir bylets kaha se aayegi aapke pass mam.
Executive: Sir dekho bylets ki bhai jitni hai we will show you nahi kar sakte main mana kar dungi sir ki nahi sir main failure ho gayi aur batao sir main aap ek kaam aapne mujhe ek mauka diya hai na main kaam kar rahi hu sir.
Customer: wo to mauka diya to mera to phir time waste hua paisa bhi waste hua na mam char mahine baad jo paisa raha wo to waste hua na mera.
Executive: Sir agar aisi baat karenge to jaise trailer king pin sir ek baat batao jaise trailer king pin hai aisa to hai nahi sir ki aapko bilkul bhi business nahi aa raha hai sir aap apna dekho bylets se sirf business nahi aata hai sir catalog view pe jaake bhi aap check kar sakte ho catalog view pe bhi to log aate hai sir aap waha se jaake to check karo ek bar ki kitne log aapke catalog dekhne aa rahe hai sir.
Customer: wo to paid property nahi rehte na usme bhi aate hai wo to catalog views wale to.
Executive: Koi baat nahi sir waise bhi to bylets use nahi kar rahe ho isi me use karke dekh lo sir might bhi 10 me se ek relevant niklega sir.
Customer: karunga to aap do to sir ji karne ke liye karunga to.
Executive: Relevant to niklega sir ek bar karke to dekho aap un cheezo ko lekin agar aap nahi karoge to sir aise kaise chalega aapka business.
Customer: to sir aapne kaha bylets use nahi kar raha hu main bylets hai kaha ye to batao use konsi karni hai.
Executive: Sir maine kaha bola maine bola sir agar bylead nahi aa rahi hai to bylead points hamare pass pada hai use karne ke liye theek hai to aap us lead points ko aap apne catalog view me use kar lijiye sir main ye keh rahi hu.
Customer: Madam ye paid profile ka kya matlab hua wo to already aata hai jo bhi meri profile dekhta hai automatically wo aa jata hai catalog views me agar paid profile nahi hai sir catalog view me bata deti hu kya hota hai catalog view ke andar koi bhi client agar particular aapki profile pe aake cheeze check kar raha hai to wo definitely in cheezo pe aapko pata chalta hai ki bhai is bande ne yaha pe ye cheez ki hai theek hai ha ha to isliye usse pata chalta hai to aap us bande ko phone kar ke puch sakte hai ki bhai aap hamari profile pe aaye the.
Customer: profile nahi hai to samajh nahi aata tha ye to.
Executive: kya catalog view ko jab mere sir nahi catalog view aata hai free me bhi aata hai paid me bhi aata hai pehla point dusra point catalog view ke jo links honge na sir wo paid ke zyada hote hai free ke kam hote hai teesra point abhi aap isko jab catalog view ko check karenge kisne detail kya number hai kya email id hai aapke pass bylead hai kyuki aap paid customer ho IndiaMART ke lekin free client isko access nahi kar sakta uske liye usko pay karna padega 400 sir.
Customer: Achcha. ye different hota hai aapki ek hum log SEO kar rahe hai jiske through aapka jo hai inquiry flow sorry visbility zyada ho rahi hai to might client aapke pass zyada dekhne aa raha hoga aapki profile ko zyada searching ho rahi hogi sir un logo ki nahi ho rahi hogi sir ye different hota hai sir aur main ye to bilkul bhi nahi keh rahi hu sir main phir se kahungi Vishnu sir ki main ye karu ki nahi sir hum business de rahe hai maine sirf itna bola sir main kaam kar rahi hu ha dekho IndiaMART pe sirf bylead se business nahi milta hai sir at the end aapko business chahiye IndiaMART pe char tarike se business milta hai ek hota hai aapko direct inquiry client bhejta hai dusra hota hai bylead teesra hota hai catalog view chotha hota hai aapka calls ka hai aapne last month call bhi miss kari hai client ki jabki maine aapko personally khud hi number save karaya tha sir.
Customer: Madam kab kari thi kab aayi thi call check kariye ek bar.
Executive: Sir main bata deti hu ek minute ruko ha batao. ye last month call aayi hui hai sir aapko.
Customer: Achcha. last month aapko do call aayi hai jisme se aapne ek pick ki hai ek screenshot bhejiye mam mere ko screenshot bhejiye mam mere ko ha main bhej deti hu sir ek minute bhejiye mam chalu me bhejiye ha ha ha. dekho sir maine screenshot bheja hai isme aapko saaf nazar aa raha hai ki aapko do call aayi hai jisme se ek aapne miss kari hai ek aapne receive ki hai.
Customer: abhi to band hai. ji theek hai ab main ek cheez aur batati hu aapko nahi jaise ho gayi iska matlab karan kya hua.
Executive: Iska matlab ye hua client ne aapko call kiya aapne isko miss kar diya hai ab I don't know ki aapne isse call back kar ke baat kari hai ya nahi kari hai par ye track hamare yaha nahi hua hamare yaha sirf ye track hua ki aapko buyer ne call kiya but aapne nahi pick kiya theek hai pehla point dusra cheez abhi aapko maine ek aur screenshot bheja hai ye aapko direct inquiry ka hai jo client direct aapko bhejte hai ha ji to last month bhi aapko sir total agar aap dekhoge to total 21 dikh raha hai october me theek hai jisme che aapko direct buyer ne approach kiya even abhi tak november me bhi teen din hue ek inquiry aapko aa chuki hai sir direct achcha aur ye aapko na jo check karna hai na sir mam ye jo call aur direct inquiry na ye to mere paid plan me milta hai na jab bhi aati hai mere ko.
Executive: Sir dekho aise nahi aati main aapko phir se bhej rahi hu ye lo screenshot mere pass plan tha na mere ko pata hai na mam matlab plan nahi tha usme sir agar kuch to usme bhi changes hoga na sir aap mujhe batao chalo main kehti hu free client me bhi aa raha hoga free me lekin aa raha hoga details to nahi mil rahi hogi client ki sir aap ye bhi dekhiye na sir client ki information to nahi mil rahi hogi aapko achcha nahi details client se details nahi mil rahi hogi usme hmm jaise call aa gaya to usme to baat kar raha na sidha hi mere se wo.
Executive: Call to dikh raha hai sir jaise ye jo maine bheja na aapko inquiry direct ye aapke me aap aap access kaha se karte ho aap mobile se karte ho desktop se karte ho mobile se ab mobile pe jaake na lead manager pe jaya kijiye lead manager me jaake aapke pass do option teeno charo options hote hai waha source me jaakar ha theek hai ha waha pe aap dekha karo direct filter ye gaya karo pehle bylead ka ha theek hai waha pe wo wali byleads hoti hai jo aapne use kari hoti hai purchase kar ke us pe buyer ka detail waha chala jata hai theek hai phir waha pe lagaya karo sir inquiry ka filter sirf inquiry bylead hata diya karo only inquiry to waha pe wo direct inquiry aayegi jo client ne direct aapko bheji hai wo bylead se alag hogi sir theek hai use track kiya karo unko reply kiya karo unhe call kar ke pucha karo theek hai call select karoge to jaise abhi maine bola na ek call miss ho gayi aapko nahi pata chala aur to wo call back numbers bhi aapko dikh jayenge ki ye iska call aaya tha to is tarike se bhi aap use karo sir kyuki dekho at the end Vishnu ji aap bhi business lene baithe ho main samajh rahi hu bataiye bylets ka topic plan lene se pehle to madam kya ye itni cheeze to aapne mere ko plan dene se pehle batai nahi ye sab cheeze sir aap itne purane client ho ye to purani cheeze hai sir main to aapko phir bhi ek bar dobara explain kar rahi hu ha to purane experience se to main mana kar raha tha koi baat nahi sir main kaam karti hu agar aisi baat hai aap ek bar na video meeting pe aao main ek bar dobara se aapko zero se start karti hu to bylets to milegi mere ko wo chahiye mam mere ko bylets chahiye aapne bylets likh ke diya mere ko bylets chahiye sir bylead main kaise la ke du main ghar se banwa du bylead aap mujhe batao sir 100% aapne likh ke diya na mam nahi to maine ye likh ke nahi diya maine likh ke diya hai 100% uses ka agar aap use karte ho to consume karne ke liye to karne ke liye tayar hu mere ko ha to consume karne ke liye honi bhi chahiye to main to samne se bol rahi hu na nahi hai sir main samne se bol rahi hu nahi hai to main kaise aapko point out kar sakti hu sir refund kara do aap se refund kara do mere ko abhi karwa do aap theek hai sir theek hai main bol deti hu agar aapko nahi sabar hai sir teen mahine ka bhi to theek hai sir jaisa aap kahenge main wo karne ke liye ready hu plan lene se pehle aap mere ko bhi nahi sabar kuch sir main to bol rahi hu maine to aapko bola nahi abhi tak bhi sir ye aapka call hai sir mera to nahi hai sir aap process kar dijiye jo bhi hai na process hai refund ka theek hai sir theek hai process kar do okay sir theek hai sir theek hai theek hai. ji
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants buyleads as promised.

- Customer wants a refund.

- Customer says he was charged more than email offer.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about website enrichment.

- Executive shared screenshots of missed calls and inquiries.

- Executive explained how to check leads in lead manager.

- Executive agreed to process the refund.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will process the refund.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, subscription, calls, catalog, payment
